George Webster

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Fred Balli
  3. Foster Family Alt: Ball
  4. Location of Family: Rural Franklin County, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Franklin, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 10
  8. Date of Birth: 1903
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Franklin City News, 28 June 1913; OTR 430; OTR p 191; Macon History, Macon, Neb., p 231.
